review: I love the the options it gives and simplicity. I only rate it low because it periodically drops the wifi connection. After it does this you have to reset it and reconnect. Many others have same problem. Other devices work just fine on the wifi it won't connect to.

review: So far, I really love the Fire TV Stick, although my recent busy schedule hasn't given much time to get to know it yet
author: Gunny

review: Not quite a google chromecast, not quite a roku, but somewhere in the middle. "Screen-casting" is not nearly as simplistic or as easy as a chromecast, but I like the ability to use the included remote OR the android app for your phone to control it. A menu-based system on your tv is also helpful when trying to watch things like netflix, hulu plus, etc. Appstore for Fire TV seems to be continually growing, with an already extensive list of applications (and some games too!). Very easy to use and very functional. I use this daily!!

review: A little slow, but that's compared to an AppleTV. Being that it's less than half the price and more customizable…it's pretty nice.
